Convenient, Quick, and Secure
Collaborate on Luggage to Shop Together
WeLugg
About Company
Services

WeLugg is an online platform centered around sharing luggage

where everyone can easily and safely conduct purchasing transactions through our platform

allowing you to buy gifts and delicacies from around the world without leaving home.

WeLugg 是一個以行李共享為主的線上平台

透過我們的平台，您可以輕鬆且安全地進行代購交易

不必出門即可購買世界各地的禮品和美食。

About Us
Team Members
Kitson Lam
Designer
Design is not just what it looks like and feels like.
Design is how it works.
香港,九龍
工業設計系 - 大學部三年級
4月7日
Introduction

我是一個很喜歡發問，經常會思考為什麼的人。

當發現有問題時，會馬上著手找答案。

而我認為做設計是需要勇於發問，並且接受評價才會有所進步。

我也很喜歡完成一個作品或設計時的成就感，在每一個設計的步驟我都會很認真參與，享受過程

Travel Experience
